metadata.description: The physical and magnetic pull between you two

astrological_basis.what_it_measures: Mars-Venus aspects show physical attraction. Pluto adds intensity and magnetism. Mars-Mars shows passion dynamics.

planet_meanings.Venus: attraction style and what draws you in

very_low.label: Flat
very_low.guidance: Chemistry weak or one-sided; may feel more like friendship.

low.label: Faint
low.guidance: Light pull but not intense; talk about slow burn or values over heat.

mid.label: Warm
mid.guidance: Attraction there but not all-consuming; can grow with trust.

high.label: Magnetic
high.guidance: Clear mutual pull; encourage owning it while staying grounded.

very_high.label: Blazing
very_high.guidance: Very strong spark; balance passion with emotional safety.
